nodes.text: Nigh was a male individual who earned the rank of Imperial Agent in the Sith Empire's Intelligence division during the Great Galactic War against the Galactic Republic. During the war he was stationed on board Vaiken Spacedock, a space station located in the Imperial fleet, where he worked in the supplies section and sold equipment to other Imperials. While working he wore red and gold colored armor, and carried a blaster rifle.

Nigh was created for Star Wars: The Old Republic, an MMORPG released by BioWare in 2011. In the game he serves as an Imperial operations gear vendor within the Imperial fleet. He was later removed in Game Update 5.0 on November 29, 2016, which retired the PvP and PvE gear vendors in favor of the Command system.
